welcome_message_body: Welcome to Catia La Mar, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Panaderia Atlantimar
restaurants.description: Panaderia Atlantimar is a bakery located in Catia La Mar.
restaurants.address: Av. Atlantida, Catia La Mar , Estado Vargas

restaurants.name: Brisas del Mar
restaurants.description: Brisas del Mar is a seafood restaurant located in Catía La Mar.
restaurants.address: Av. Ppal. de Puerto Viejo, Catía La Mar 1162, Estado Vargas

restaurants.name: Il Fogón de la Nona
restaurants.description: Il Fogón de la Nona is a italian restaurant located in Catia La Mar.
restaurants.address: Avenida El Ejercito, Catia La Mar 1162, Estado Vargas

restaurants.name: El Mesón del Faro
restaurants.description: El Mesón del Faro is a spanish restaurant located in Catia La Mar.
restaurants.address: Catia La Mar (Av. Ppal. de Puerto Viejo), Catia La Mar 1162, Estado Vargas

restaurants.name: Tostadas Las Amazonas
restaurants.description: Tostadas Las Amazonas is a arepa restaurant located in Catia La Mar.
restaurants.address: Av. El Ejercito, Catia La Mar 1162, Estado Vargas

terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.
